name: Episode 1 Re-Mastered DEMO
description:
Hallo!

Felt like it'd been too long since I uploaded anything, so here's a quick preview of what the remastered Episode 1 will look like. It's literally just the main menu, ha, but hopefully it's good for a couple seconds of amusement.  

Everything's well underway, but if there is anything you'd like changed/added for this or a future build, the feedback is quite welcome--especially whether you think the kick dummy should be robotic or not :)
